text: You are communicating with an AI enabled virtual assistant. Your chat may be recorded, monitored, or retained by us and our vendors to help improve and personalize our services for you. By continuing with this chat, you consent to this. For more information check out our {{ https://www.brightspeed.com/privacy-notice.html | Privacy Notice}}.
How can I help you today?
I understand that you need assistance with retrieving your username.

Before we can help, I need to find your account. Starting with the area code please enter a telephone number associated with your account, or your 9 or 10 digit billing account number. If your account number begins with the letters "PPB", make sure to include that too.
Please select one of the authentication options below:

text.text: i want to change a password

text:
To change your password, please visit our website and click on the "Forgot Password" link. You will then be prompted to enter your email address, and we will send you a link to reset your password.

Would you like me to send you an email guide on how to reset your password on the website for future reference?
I have sent an email to randy549@getnada.com with instructions on how to reset your password. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
